welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Vanves, France! Get ready to experience the charming streets and bustling markets of this city known for its rich culture and history. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limited connection time of 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights at Le Bourget Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.
